faqs.question: Issue with delivered product(s)
faqs.answer: If your delivered product is damaged or not as described, you can request a replacement or refund within the app under order details.

faqs.question: Can I return the delivery order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can return your delivered order within the return window specified in the app. Navigate to your order details and select ‘Return’ to initiate the process.

faqs.question: Can I replace my delivered order?
faqs.answer: Yes, if you received the wrong item or a defective product, you can request a replacement through the app’s order support section.

faqs.question: Report rider behaviour issues
faqs.answer: To report inappropriate rider behaviour, please describe the incident and our support team will investigate promptly.

faqs.question: Did not receive the order or missing items
faqs.answer: If your order is missing items or not received, please reach out via support and we’ll assist you to resolve it or issue a refund.
